record.title: MAVEN Langmuir Probe and Waves (LPW) Raw Data Bundle
record.description: A bundle that contains raw uncompressed, uncalibrated data from the MAVEN Langmuir Probe and Waves (LPW) telemetry packets. Includes data from active sub-cycle waves, PAS sub-cycle MF, LF and HF waves, Langmuir probe sub-cycle, active DAC read back information, active table read back, housekeeping information including LPW temperatures and voltages, raw Medium Frequency High Speed Burst Mode (HSBM) packet data, and EUV data including EUV temperatures.
record.keywords: PDS; PDS4; Maven; Calibrated; Magnetosphere; Fields; Electric; Waves; Mars Atmosphere and Volatile EvolutioN Mission; MAVEN; Langmuir Probe and Waves Instrument; Mars
